nodes.text: A crime syndicate consisting of members of the Rodian and Sullustan species operated on the Bothan homeworld of Bothawui during the Galactic Civil War. The group was composed of bungling, overconfident, small-time hoods who wished to make a name for themselves. In 3.5 ABY, the crime syndicate ran afoul of a group of undercover Alliance Intelligence agents who were on a mission to Bothawui.
